name: fl(AI)ppy robot
description:
I recommend playing the .EXE, because it performs better than the web version, but its your choice, so do whatever works best for you :D

fl(AI)ppy robot is a game, much like Flappy Bird, however, the bird is controlled by an AI! All that you can do is place blocks in order to steer the robot into the correct direction. Can you get a new highscore, or will your robot be plunged into the realm of eternal pain and suffering? (or is it really not that deep?) Why not play and find out?

Controls: Left click to place a block!

Hints: The upper side of the block is the best to jump off so try to put a block where the robot is going to come down, and try to place blocks in advance!

Have Fun! I hope that you enjoy it! It's really hard, too so don't be discouraged if you fail a lot!

A game by Oliver,  Age 13
